JobFullDesc: At Raytheon Missiles & Defense, by combining our vast resources and investments, we are able to dedicate ourselves to solving mission-level vs. product-level customer challenges – together we can anticipate more, move faster and make a bigger impact on the big picture.Job Summary:The Electrical Products Team’s responsibilities encompass product design and implementation, through component and product level test. We collaborate with the Cross Product Team to define product and component requirements and then perform design, implementation and test. The Electrical Products Team is responsible for electrical design and test of all products within the Integrated Product Team within RMD. Our vision is to drive business growth through innovative and affordable solutions, technical leadership, flawless execution and electrical engineering expertise.The Electrical Products Team is seeking an individual for the RMD Engineering Operations Manager role.
